mapper.insert: INSERT INTO workspace(wrkspc_id, wrkspc_name, description, wrkspc_type, admin_user_id, update_date, update_user_id) VALUES (#{wrkspcId}, #{wrkspcName}, #{description}, #{wrkspcType}, #{adminUserId}, NOW(), #{updateUserId})
mapper.select: SELECT wrkspc_id, wrkspc_name, description, wrkspc_type, admin_user_id, update_date, update_user_id FROM workspace ORDER BY update_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRowNum}, #{rowsPerPage}

SELECT wrkspc_id, wrkspc_name, wrkspc_type, (SELECT COUNT(nb.note_id) FROM notebook nb INNER JOIN workspace_object wo ON nb.note_id = wo.wrkspc_obj_id AND wo.obj_status != 'DROPPED' INNER JOIN workspace_assign wa ON nb.note_id = wa.wrkspc_obj_id WHERE wa.wrkspc_id = w.wrkspc_id ) AS total_of_notebooks, 0 AS total_of_queries, (SELECT COUNT(d.datasource_id) FROM datasource d INNER JOIN workspace_object wo ON d.datasource_id = wo.wrkspc_obj_id AND wo.obj_status != 'DROPPED' INNER JOIN workspace_assign wa ON d.datasource_id = wa.wrkspc_obj_id WHERE wa.wrkspc_id = w.wrkspc_id ) AS total_of_datasource, (SELECT COUNT(ws.user_id) FROM workspace_share ws WHERE ws.wrkspc_id = w.wrkspc_id ) AS total_of_members, 0 AS total_of_jobs FROM workspace w WHERE wrkspc_id = #{wrkspcId}

SELECT ws.wrkspc_id, u.id, u.name, u.user_grp_cd, r.role_name FROM workspace_share ws INNER JOIN user u ON u.id = ws.user_id INNER JOIN role r ON u.user_grp_cd = r.role_cd WHERE ws.wrkspc_id = #{wrkspcId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO workspace_share(wrkspc_id, user_id, update_date, update_user_id) VALUES (#{wrkspcId}, #{userId}, NOW(), #{updateUserId})
